owunge kridakayan ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliyedi etharam kapi penuneda natha.engalanthaye pawathi 2009 wissayi 20 loka kusalana tharagawaliyedi dakunu aprikawe soya ganima wu wamathin wega pandu yawana wen panel da kandayamata ahimiwa siti.ikiliye aabadhayak hethuwen indiyawedi ekama tharagayakata ho sahabhagi nowi yali siyarata paminimata panelta sidu wiya.wega pandu yawana del steyin ha thun iriyawwenma kapi penana jaks kalis ha albi mokal harunu wita dakunu aprikawe pradhana pandu yawannan indiyanu primiyar lig tharaga bime boho wita sitiye paththakini.danga panduwa karibiyanhi wadagath sadhakayak bawata pathwimata ida thibeddi wamathin pandu yawana rolof wandar marw ek tharagayakata pamanak sahabhagi wima ha pita danga pandu yawana johan botha pitiyata nopiwisima pilibanda smith kalakirimata pathwa siti. ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliya purama daskam dakwu ekama dakunu aprikanu pithikaruwa wuye jaks kalis pamani.royal chalenjars bangalor pila wenuwen aarambhaka pithikaruwaku lesin ohu boho paladayi pithikaruweku wiya. ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliye mul awasthawaladi pandu rakimin sitiyadi angilla thuwala kara gath smith in pasuwa yali piththakathata gaththe aprel 14 wanida pamani.dakunu aprikanu kandayame 10 deneku sathi anthaye kodew dupath bala pitathwa giya athara kalis, steyin, albi mokal, je. pi. dumini ha harshal gibs yana pas dena ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliya nima wimen pasuwa kandayamata ekwimata niyamithawa sitiyaha.awama balaporoththu sahithawa mewara wissayi 20 loka kusalana tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wima dakunu aprikawata samahara wita wasidayaka wimatada ida thibe.
